Specimen Type: Whole blood, buccal swab, or isolated genomic DNA
Purpose: High-resolution identification of HLA C alleles for applications such as stem cell or organ transplantation compatibility and disease association studies.
Container: EDTA or ACD tube for blood; buccal swab/stick for oral specimens
Equipment: Thermocycler, gel electrophoresis system, capillary sequencer or NGS sequencer, centrifuge, pipettes
